name: Yubel - The Chosen
text: If this card is Summoned: Add 1 "Yubel" card or 1 card that list "Yubel" in its text from your Deck to your hand. You can send this face-up card to the GY; then Special Summon 1 "Yubel" from your hand or GY. Once per turn (Quick Effect): If your opponent activates a monster effect in hand: negate that effect, and if you do, send both this card and that card to the GY.
